degree.title: Degree Equivalence
degree.headline: National Engineering Degree (Tunisia) – Master’s level (EQF 7)
degree.summary: Official 5-year engineering program (Bac+5). Internationally comparable to a Master’s Degree in Engineering (EQF Level 7).

regions.fr: France: Ingénieur diplômé = Grade de Master (Bac+5).
regions.ca: Canada: Usually evaluated as B.Eng (4–5 yrs), sometimes Master depending on specialty.
regions.de: Germany: Recognized comparable to Master / Diplom-Ingenieur.
regions.it: Italy: Laurea Magistrale in Ingegneria (Master level).
regions.uk: UK ENIC: Comparable to RQF Level 7 (Master).
regions.us: USA (WES/ECE): Commonly Bachelor of Science in Engineering; occasionally Bachelor + Graduate study (Master) depending on institution.
regions.gulf: Gulf countries: Recognized as Bachelor of Engineering / Engineer (suitable for software engineering roles).

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.subtitle: What I work with

stories.frontend: I craft smooth React/Next interfaces with strong motion, access needs, and language support.
stories.backend: I build steady APIs with NestJS, Flask, Django, and Node plus data or ML jobs.
stories.tools: I shape CI/CD, monitoring, and platform tools so releases stay calm and safe.

skills.recentWorkExpert: Led design, reviews, and mentoring for this stack during live launches.
skills.recentWorkContributor: Build features with product squads and keep each release on track.

descriptions.ai: Built an AI clinic assistant by cleaning medical data and fine-tuning T5 models.
descriptions.fullstack: Ship React/Angular fronts backed by NestJS or Spring Boot APIs for clear flows.
descriptions.devops: Set up Jenkins pipelines, SonarQube checks, Grafana, and Prometheus for my PFE.
descriptions.quality: Add unit/integration tests plus docs so teammates can extend features safely.
descriptions.intl: Deliver English/French layouts with RTL-ready styles and simple copy.
descriptions.collab: Work with squads, share progress notes, and keep handoffs simple.
